title: Foreign exchange earnings from tourism in India 2000 to 2018
yAxis: Foreign exchange earnings in billion U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Foreign exchange earnings in billion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 19.
In general Foreign exchange earnings in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Foreign exchange earnings in billion U.S. dollars, of value 28.59 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest Foreign exchange earnings in billion U.S. dollars, of value 3.1 was reported at Year 2002
